attributes.action: Make airline and holiday companies stop charging more in holidays
attributes.additional_details: Make airline prices fair during children’s holiday periods so we can make children’s attendance better and take them away in there school half terms
attributes.background: All I hear recently is the radio advert telling us to not take our children out of school during term time as it affects there education. But why should airline and holiday companies get away with charging us through the roof! If they charged normal prices parents wouldn’t need to take them out

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

At the moment, airlines and holiday companies decide their own prices. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
